import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'FirstApp'; mobiles=[ { name:"abc", price:200, ram:4, storage:64 }, { name:"xyz", price:300, ram:6, storage:120 } ]; }
Manage Mobiles
